name: dworld
description: d-world drives the d-zone simulation on https://nntin.xyz/d-zone
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
install_msg: this cog is really early in its development. It will broadcast all messages. Anyone can write their own websocket client implementation and log all the events. So this is a security risk nightmare. When Discord's OAuth2 is implemented it will be safe to use. Use it only experimentally.
author: Tin Nguyen
